advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners in League A advanced to Nations League Finals
advancements.relegated_notes: Fourth-placed teams in League A relegated to League B

advancements.relegated_notes: Fourth-placed teams in League B relegated to League C

teams.banned_notes: Russia were suspended and automatically relegated to League C due to their country's invasion of Ukraine.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners in League C promoted to League B
advancements.relegated_notes: The 2 worst fourth-placed teams in League C participated in Relegation play-outs
